subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Darcy Regier, the Buffalo Sabres’ general manager, received a two-year contract extension. Regier, who was entering the final year of a contract, is signed through the 2010-11 season.
snippet: Darcy Regier, the Buffalo Sabres’ general manager, received a two-year contract extension. Regier, who was entering the final year of a contract, is signed through the 2010-11 season.
